title: New Liverpool Soccer Font...
content:
Hey, me yet again :-)

I really appreciate the help I get from you guys here, it's really useful so I can make the numbers!

Any ideas on this gold Liverpool font?

[http://cache.gettyimages.com/comp/55394612.jpg?x=x&dasite=GettyImages&ef...](http://web.archive.org/web/20120203183851/http:/cache.gettyimages.com/comp/55394612.jpg?x=x&dasite=GettyImages&ef=2&ev=1&dareq=AB27D0502010942195534B1B9E10FCFBA6BA2F51AC9A65ECAC9EDBE4E6F952F6 "http://cache.gettyimages.com/comp/55394612.jpg?x=x&dasite=GettyImages&ef=2&ev=1&dareq=AB27D0502010942195534B1B9E10FCFBA6BA2F51AC9A65ECAC9EDBE4E6F952F6")

[http://cache.gettyimages.com/comp/55394327.jpg?x=x&dasite=GettyImages&ef...](http://web.archive.org/web/20120203183851/http:/cache.gettyimages.com/comp/55394327.jpg?x=x&dasite=GettyImages&ef=2&ev=1&dareq=0D268A684A345E0DD7F210D5F5DAAAD3781CF461BB6606AD "http://cache.gettyimages.com/comp/55394327.jpg?x=x&dasite=GettyImages&ef=2&ev=1&dareq=0D268A684A345E0DD7F210D5F5DAAAD3781CF461BB6606AD")

[http://cache.gettyimages.com/comp/55394261.jpg?x=x&dasite=GettyImages&ef...](http://web.archive.org/web/20120203183851/http:/cache.gettyimages.com/comp/55394261.jpg?x=x&dasite=GettyImages&ef=2&ev=1&dareq=AB27D0502010942195534B1B9E10FCFBE62B7547D6BA1BB8AC9EDBE4E6F952F6 "http://cache.gettyimages.com/comp/55394261.jpg?x=x&dasite=GettyImages&ef=2&ev=1&dareq=AB27D0502010942195534B1B9E10FCFBE62B7547D6BA1BB8AC9EDBE4E6F952F6")

Again, any help appreciated, thanks.
author: Tim7

comments.content:
Your images aren't working for me. If [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20120203183851/http:/upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/b/b2/Liverpool_FC_logo.png) is what you're looking for, it looks like [Albertus](http://web.archive.org/web/20120203183851/http:/www.fontshop.com/?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&searchby=manufacturer&displayfontid=LH.107886.0.0).

- Lex

The Carlsberg logo or the names of the players on their backs (which simply looks like a condensed classic sans (Helvetica, Univers, Futura))?

Anyways, I prefer rugby :)

Its the Gold numbering/lettering that I'm trying to find.

Thanks for the help guys, but none of those match :(

The lettering looks like Century Gothic to me. Maybe Avant Garde or Futura. Definitely a geometric typeface though.

The numbers are something else.

- Lex

Aaah, I see, thanks Lex!

Here's a better shot of the numbers 1 and 4:

[http://www.evo-web.co.uk/forums/image.php?u=25893&dateline=1128254008](http://web.archive.org/web/20120203183851/http:/www.evo-web.co.uk/forums/image.php?u=25893&dateline=1128254008 "http://www.evo-web.co.uk/forums/image.php?u=25893&dateline=1128254008")

You call that a better shot? It's tiny! :^D

Nonetheless, I think it's [Mark van Bronkhorst](http://web.archive.org/web/20120203183851/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Mark%20van%20Bronkhorst)'s [ITC Conduit](http://web.archive.org/web/20120203183851/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=C.100316.5.11&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=0123456789&sampleSize=48).
Wow, thanks! That is a very good match. Thank you :).
